document_data.caption: A map showing Warm Beds on Prespur Street.
document_data.name: Warm Beds
document_data.mainbody: '''Warm Beds''' was an [[inn]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn stood three storys tall.
document_data.Location: Warm Beds was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] where [[Presper Street]] met [[Ship Street (Waterdeep)|Ship Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5308b}}
document_data.Inhabitants: A [[sage]] named [[Kromnlor Sernar]] lived within the inn.
